tool_description: The EU VAT Validation (VIES) API is a powerful tool designed to facilitate seamless and accurate verification of Value Added Tax (VAT) numbers across all European Union member countries. This API streamlines the validation process, ensuring compliance with EU tax regulations and promoting transparency in cross-border transactions.
name: EU VAT Validation (VIES)
title: EU VAT Validation (VIES)

api_list.name: VAT Full
api_list.description: This endpoints check if the VAT ID is valid or invalid and displays the company name and address

api_list.name: VAT (True or False)
api_list.description: This endpoints check if the VAT ID is valid or invalid
